Class InputLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
      • InputLimiter

  • public class InputLimiter
extends javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
    Limits what the player is capable of inputting with the keyboard to a number between 1 and 9
